name: Suspicious Invoke-Item From Mount-DiskImage
description: Adversaries may abuse container files such as disk image (.iso, .vhd) file formats to deliver malicious payloads that may not be tagged with MOTW.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*Mount\-DiskImage\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-ImagePath\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*Get\-Volume* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.DriveLetter* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*invoke\-item\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\)\:\\*)`
